metadata.title: jenkins-2-plugins: checkmarx: SSL/TLS certificate validation disabled by default in Checkmarx Plugin (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin 2022.4.3 and earlier disables SSL/TLS validation for connections to the Checkmarx server by default. 
            STATEMENT: The Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin is not shipped in any of the Red Hat products. Hence, closing as not a bug.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
